name: Want to be a mutant
description: For whatever reason you have decided to go on a journey to change your genetic code and mutate your body. You have already got your genetic code primed for safer mutating of it by a going to a expermental goverment sponsored clinic before the chaos happened.

name: Trained Morgue Assistant
description: You have trained to work at a morgue so you are desensitized to the sight of a human's innards, and can dissect human corpses without penalty.
